name: Lab of lies
description:
Made for the BenBonk game jam.

You are trapped in a mad laboratory: your only objective is to escape from this insane place.. but beware of what will you encounter..

[WASD to move, E to interact with objects]

Sadly I did not have much time to complete it, and I'm a beginner learning Unity. Hope you can find it interesting and enjoy playing it :)

There are some hilarious bugs.. I won't spoiler which..  I really did not have time to playtest but hope you have fun :)

(I messed some things the last hour and that cause the bugs, I'm sorry for that)

Big thanks to my discord team, it was a fun, exciting and panicking experience!

Sound: https://mikey0929music.itch.io/
